name: Portfolio Website
desc: Personal portfolio website. Don't need much info about it, just scroll down. You're here only!

name: Strategies For Detecting and Fortifying Internet Loan Security
desc:
The Loan Application Approval Prediction System automates the loan approval process using a machine learning model
    trained on historical loan application data to predict outcomes based on user data, reducing the need for
     physical bank visits. Users can conveniently apply for loans and receive instant feedback via an online platform. 
     The project integrates HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a user-friendly interface, with Python and SQL for back-end 
     processing and data management. It ensures data privacy with secure login and registration functionalities and 
     features a comprehensive loan application form and results page for predictions. Developed with tools like VS 
     Code and Jupyter Notebook, this system enhances the efficiency and accessibility of the loan application process 
     for both applicants and financial institutions.

name: Law talk
desc:
The Legal Query Response System is a web-based application designed to provide users with relevant legal information based on their queries. Built using Python, Flask, and MongoDB, this system combines user-friendly features with advanced natural language processing techniques to deliver accurate and relevant legal responses. The application utilizes a pre-existing dataset containing legal queries, responses, applicable legal articles, and usage information. By implementing the TF-IDF (Term Frequency-Inverse Document Frequency) model and cosine similarity, the system efficiently matches user queries with the most suitable responses.

        Users can register and log in to the system, ensuring that their sessions are secure and personalized. The registration process involves securely hashing passwords using the werkzeug library, and the login system checks these hashed passwords for authentication. Once logged in, users can submit their legal queries through the interface, and the system returns the most relevant response along with details of the applicable legal articles. The application also keeps a history of user queries, allowing users to revisit previous searches easily.

name: A page for Restaurant
desc:
The Restaurant Website is a visually appealing and user-friendly platform 
    that provides customers with a comprehensive digital experience. It features a detailed menu with descriptions
     and pricing, branch locations, social media links, and contact details. The website includes an online
      ordering system for direct food orders, enhancing convenience. Built with HTML and CSS using tools like
       VS Code, the site offers a responsive and engaging interface across various devices. This project provided 
       valuable front-end development experience, combining essential features to enhance the restaurant's 
       digital presence and improve customer satisfaction.

name: Three Dimensional Agumented Reality Portal
desc:
Our project, the Three-Dimensional Augmented Portal, revolutionizes the way we interact with the virtual 
    world by seamlessly blending it with reality. Utilizing the advanced capabilities of Meta Spark, this
     innovative platform enables users to visualize and engage with three-dimensional virtual environments 
     and objects as if they were physically present. This technology transforms educational experiences, making 
     complex concepts more accessible and engaging through interactive and immersive visualizations. By allowing 
     students and learners to interact with 3D models and simulations, it enhances understanding and retention of 
     information, making learning more effective and enjoyable.

name: Static portfolio
desc:
The Personal Portfolio Page is a vibrant showcase of professional achievements and projects,
    crafted with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. This visually captivating website provides an engaging 
    user experience with smooth transitions and a colorful design. It features detailed biographical 
    information, project descriptions, and contact details, inviting potential collaborators, clients,
     and employers to connect. The portfolio highlights the creator's skills and dedication to 
     craftsmanship and innovation in web development.
